step_one: Step 1: Export Review List from E-commerce Platform
step_one_subtitle: Prepare the exported .xlsx review list file before analysis
step_one_instruction: How to Export Reviews from E-commerce Platforms
step_one_write1: We support direct export from Ecommerce sites and nearly all popular browser extensions, including Data Miner Scrapper, Webrobots, and APIFY.
step_one_write2: Choose your favorite extension to export the review list. We are compatible with them all.
step_two_col2_markdown: ##### Please upload the review list on the right üëâ
step_two_col2_markdown2: ‚úÖ Use the .xlsx format</br>‚úÖ Upload the file unmodified.
step_two_warning: Please upload a table file that contains review content first.
step_two_success1: File uploaded successfully! Your file contains {} valid reviews.</br>Due to the capacity limit of the test version, the first {} valid reviews will be analyzed.
step_two_success2: File uploaded successfully! Your file contains {} valid reviews.
step_two_expander: Expand the review list to be analyzed
step_two_with_markdown: *Review content is combined for the first review and subsequent follow-up comments from the same user*
step_two_error: File is incorrect. Please make sure you upload a valid file containing review content.
step_three_markdown: Step 3: Customize and Start Your Analysis üöÄ
step_three_markdown2: Enter product information and your focus to obtain more customized analysis results
step_three_prod_info-placeholder: E.g., electric toothbrush, infant formula, women's dresses...
step_three_advanced_options_markdown: Enter a specific question you want to know from the review list
step_three_input_question: Please enter in the form of a question
step_three_input_question_placeholder: E.g., Do customers like feature A of this product?
step_three_step3b_col1: Select the model you want to use
step_three_selected_model: Model Selection (please refer to the model comparison table below for model selection)
